The course will be based on the presentations in:
Lineare Kontrolltheorie, H.W. Knobloch, H. Kwakernaak, Springer, 1985.
Mathematical Control Theory: Deterministic Finite Dimensional Systems, E. Sontag, Springer, 1998.
Controllability and Observability, R.E. Kalman, Lectures on Controllability and Observability, Springer, 2010.
Mathematical Systems Theory I - Modelling, State Space Analysis, Stability and Robustness, D. Hinrichsen, A.J. Pritchard, Springer, 2005.
Linear Optimal Control Systems, H. Kwakernaak, R. Sivan, Wiley-Interscience, 1972.
Linear Systems, T. Kailath, Prentice-Hall, 1980.
Robust and optimal control, K. Zhou, J. Doyle, K. Glover, Prentice Hall, 1996.
An Introduction to Infinite Dimensional Linear Systems Theory, R.F. Curtain, H.J. Zwart, Springer, 1995.
